translation: I am not manifest to all, veiled as I am by the Yoga-Maya. This deluded world does not know Me, who am unborn and imperishable.
commentary: 7.25 Not not? I'm I? Light: manifest? of all of all? veiled by YogaMaya? Fool deluded? This is this? Not not? recognizes knows? Lokah world? Mam Me? Ajam unborn? infinitive imperishable.Commentary I am not manifest to all the people? but I am certainly manifest to the chosen few who are My devotees? who have taken sole refuge in Me alone. I am not visible to those who are deluded by the three
